long_description: The North Face Heckler daypack has a spacious main compartment fits most 15 in. laptops, a smaller secondary compartment with dividers, and a front compartment that can stash your music player. Large main compartment features a universal sleeve that accommodates most 15 in. laptops and rip-and-stick accessory pockets. Main compartment also includes clips and an exit port for a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Secondary compartment contains organizational dividers; front stash pocket is perfect for a music player. Side mesh water-bottle pockets, center daisy chain and criss-cross bungee cord on the pack's face provide external storage options. Injection-molded shoulder straps, removable hipbelt and stitched foam back panel offer comfort. The North Face Heckler daypack is made of light and tough polyester that stands up to years of outdoor adventures.
short_description: The North Face Heckler daypack has a spacious main compartment fits most 15 in. laptops, a smaller secondary compartment with dividers, and a front compartment that can stash your music player.
